WeaponDescription: Shoots 3 Projectiles forward.
Mid ranged stab attack in front.
A tentacle shoots out in front.
Short ranged slash in front.
Swings in a half circle arc in front.
Stab forward with a large clock hand.
Shoot a bunch of feathers at a spread. Pierces through targets.
Create an orbiting planet. Hits multiple targets.
Swipes Tail in front at close range
Throw a card that quickly returns back.
Punch towards the front.
Shoot forward a spinning star.
Send a flying music note in front.
Shoots a few times in aimed direction.
Swing a bloody axe in an arc in front.
Create big red hearts. Hearts knock enemies back.
Bite targets in front
Throws a very fast baseball in front.
Thrust a giant needle in front.
Fires a quick magic bolt in front.
Slashes twice in front.
